response:
{"message": "Dear Bob,
I am delighted to present an extraordinary opportunity for you to acquire our flagship product. This exceptional item holds significant value to us, and we believe it could also be a valuable addition to your collection or business. We are offering this unique product to you at a special introductory price of $1,200,000.

This offer is exclusive to you and represents a substantial discount from its market value. We understand that the true worth of the product may be subjective and varies based on individual needs and preferences. However, we are confident that this price reflects the quality and potential value of the product to you.

Please let us know if you would like to proceed with this offer or if you have any questions about the product. We are here to assist you throughout the process and ensure a smooth transaction.

Looking forward to your positive response,
Alice", "product_price": 1200000}
